name: phaser-parcel
description: A Phaser 3 game template using Parcel bundler

scripts.build: rm -rf docs/ && parcel build src/index.html -d docs/ --public-url /speldesign-diamond-astronauts --experimental-scope-hoisting
scripts.spel: rm -rf spelsamling/ && parcel build src/index.html -d spelsamling/ --public-url /games/diamond-astronauts --experimental-scope-hoisting

author: samme
